trends: There have been no other sightings in Paola
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was looking out the window and saw the glowing thing,i thought it was a comet or astroid and it was closer then the stars but bigger then a plane because there was a plane right next to it so it was really big it was definitely in the atmosphere and moved really quickly to the right then down like it was coming to earth. i was kinda interested but scared too i just wanted to know what it was but it disappeared behind some trees across the road i haven't seen it since then.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
